targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=PostgreSQL (pg_stat_statements), user=2 */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1753621012)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753631812)))
    AND((created_at >= 1753621012) AND(created_at <= 1753631812))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753621012))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753631812))
    AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'
    AND datname = 'transactions'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1753621012)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1753631812)))
        AND((created_at >= 1753621012) AND(created_at <= 1753631812))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753621012))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1753631812))
        AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'
        AND datname = 'transactions'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(total_exec_time+total_plan_time) DESC
    LIMIT 15)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(calls) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(calls) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg((total_exec_time+total_plan_time)/calls) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum((total_exec_time+total_plan_time)/calls) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1741459242))

    AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew3a-billing-postgresql01-node02.gl.mx'

    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE

        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1741459242))

    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum((total_exec_time+total_plan_time)/calls) DESC
    LIMIT 10)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(rows) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(rows) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746378857))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746389657))
    AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'

    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements

        ((created_date >= toDate(1746378857)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1746389657)))
        AND((created_at >= 1746378857) AND(created_at <= 1746389657))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746378857))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746389657))
        AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'
        AND datname = 'transactions'
    GROUP BY

        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_hit / (shared_blks_hit + shared_blks_read)) DESC
    LIMIT 15)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.description: Number of shared memory bytes returned NOT from the cache

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * 8192) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
    AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
    AND hostname = '$hostname'
    AND datname = '$datname'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate($from)) AND(created_date <= toDate($to)))
        AND((created_at >= $from) AND(created_at <= $to))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($from))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime($to))
        AND hostname = '$hostname'
        AND datname = '$datname'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_read) DESC
    LIMIT $limit)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard=PostgreSQL (pg_stat_statements), user=2 */
SELECT
    created_at * 1000 AS t,
    concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500)) AS q,
    avg(shared_blks_read * ) as value
FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
WHERE
    ((created_date >= toDate(1746379094)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1746389894)))
    AND((created_at >= 1746379094) AND(created_at <= 1746389894))
    AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746379094))
    AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746389894))
    AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'
    AND datname = 'transactions'
    AND q IN (
    SELECT
      concat(username, ' | ', substring(query, 1, 500))
    FROM pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements
    WHERE
        ((created_date >= toDate(1746379094)) AND(created_date <= toDate(1746389894)))
        AND((created_at >= 1746379094) AND(created_at <= 1746389894))
        AND created_hour >= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746379094))
        AND created_hour <= toStartOfHour(toDateTime(1746389894))
        AND hostname = 'prod-gl-gcpew1c-billing-postgresql01-node01.gl.mx'
        AND datname = 'transactions'
    GROUP BY
        username,
        datname,
        query
    ORDER BY sum(shared_blks_read) DESC
    LIMIT 15)
GROUP BY t, q
ORDER BY t ASC

panels.title: Shared blocks read

list.definition: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname
list.label: database
list.name: datname

query.formattedQuery: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by datname order by datname
query.query: select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname
query.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='PostgreSQL (pg_stat_statements)', user='1' */
select datname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by datname order by datname

list.definition: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
list.label: instance
list.name: hostname

query.formattedQuery: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 3 day) group by hostname order by hostname
query.query: select hostname from pgmetrics.pg_stat_statements where datname IN ('$datname') and created_hour >= toStartOfHour(now()-interval 1 hour) group by hostname order by hostname
query.rawQuery:
